title: Return of the Treasure Hunters
description: WARNING: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF EXTRA-TERRESTRIALS"An extraordinary secret passed on to an eldest son...Forty years on from their discovery of the artefact, Patrick and Molly are wealthy beyond their wildest dreams, having acquired the seemingly uncanny ability to strike gold wherever they seek it.Having kept their discovery to themselves for so long, they have now told their son Connor the truth about the little island off the coast of Brazil. As the eldest son of the fledgling dynasty, Connor always expected to one day have to take control of his parents' considerable wealth. But what he hadn't known was that he would also become custodian of their potentially lethal secret.But someone, or something, went to great lengths to create the artefact, to hide it, and to protect it from anyone who happened to stumble across it. And, as Patrick, Molly, and Connor are about to find out, secrets sometimes have a way of taking on a life of their ownâ€¦
author: Warren Dean
